Player History
Injured on 5/24/1965 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/16/1972 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1975...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1977, off Jerry Koosman (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1977, off Doyle Alexander (PHI)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1978, hitting .366 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Injured on 4/9/1980 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 6/27/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1982, hitting .379 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1983, hitting .414 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against New York (N) on 4/16/1984...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1984, hitting .352 with 7 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/24/1984...
Hit for the cycle against Houston on 8/6/1984...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Houston on 8/6/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1984, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1984, hitting .423 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1985, hitting .348 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1985, hitting .370 with 6 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1985, hitting .524 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1985, hitting .313 with 29 HR, 131 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1986, hitting .307 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York (N) on 7/31/1987 (Going to CIN: SS E. Yelding, RF B. Distefano. Going to NYM: CF A. Dawson)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 5/24/1988...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis on 6/29/1988...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/27/1988, off Jimmy Jones (LA)...
